name: imagesharp
description: Guidance for SixLabors ImageSharp cross-platform image processing library. USE FOR: image resizing, cropping, format conversion, watermarking, thumbnail generation, applying filters and effects, drawing text and shapes on images, metadata reading. DO NOT USE FOR: video processing, real-time computer vision (use OpenCV), GPU-accelerated rendering, PDF generation (use PdfSharpCore), 3D graphics.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
